TemporalDirections.TEXT: ,Character,Dialogue,EpisodeNo,SEID,Season 54300,ESTELLE,"Oh, so it was my fault, but not yours.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54301,FRANK,You were the one who smothered him.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54302,ESTELLE,I did not smother him.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54303,FRANK,You smothered! He couldn't get any air! He couldn't breathe! He was suffocating!,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54304,ESTELLE,"Sure, and you were always in Korea with your religious chachkis.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54305,FRANK,I had to make a living!,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54306,KRAMER,"This is excellent huh? Don't worry I didn't use too much milk, cause I know we gotta make it last.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54307,JERRY,"You know I've had to reduce my milk level. My whole life I've always filled to at least three quarters - sometimes, to the top of the cereal. Now, to conserve, I can't even see the milk anymore. It's a big adjustment.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54308,KRAMER,I bet.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54309,JERRY,It's one of the hardest things I've ever had to do.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54310,CHILES,Good morning.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54311,ELAINE,"Good morning, Jackie.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54312,JERRY,Good morning.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54313,CHILES,Is everybody ready? Didn't I tell you I wanted you to wear the cardigan?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54314,GEORGE,It makes me look older.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54315,CHILES,"Look older? Do you think this is a game? Is that what you think this is? I'm trying to give you amoral compass. You have no moral compass. You're going to walk into that courtroom, and the jury's going to see a mean, nasty, evil George Costanza. I want them to see Perry Como. No one's going to convict Perry Como. Perry Como helps out a fat tub who's getting robbed.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54316,CHILES,Do you think it's funny?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54317,JERRY,No.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54318,CHILES,"You damn right it isn't. You better not be carrying on laughing in that courtroom, funny man. Cause if you start getting all smart-alecky, making wisecracks, acting a fool, you gonna find yourself in here for a long, long time. I don't like that tie. Suzie, get one of my ties from my briefcase.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54319,ELAINE,"How do I look, Jackie?",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54320,CHILES,"Oh, you looking good. You look strong. You one fine-looking sexy lady.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54321,ELAINE,"Thank you, Jackie.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54322,KRAMER,"How bout me, Jackie?",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54323,CHILES,"Kramer, you always look good. You got respect for yourself. You're genuine. Jury's going to pick up on that.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54324,CHILES,Here.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54325,JERRY,This one?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54326,CHILES,That's right.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54327,JERRY,Do I have to?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54328,ELAINE,"Jackie says put it on, Jerry.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54329,BAILIFF,"All rise. Fourth District County Court, Latham, Massachusetts is now in session. The Honorable Judge Arthur Vandelay presiding.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54330,GEORGE,Vandelay? The judge's name is Vandelay?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54331,CHILES,Vanda who?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54332,GEORGE,"Jerry, did you hear that?",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54333,JERRY,Yeah.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54334,GEORGE,I think that's a good sign.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54335,VANDELAY,Is the District Attorney ready to proceed?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54336,HOYT,"We are, Your Honor.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54337,VANDELAY,Mr. Hoyt.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54338,HOYT,"Ladies and gentlemen, last year, our City Council by a vote of twelve to two, passed a Good Samaritan Law. Now, essentially, we made it a crime to ignore a fellow human being in trouble. Now this group from New York not only ignored, but, as we will prove, they actually mocked the victim as he was being robbed at gunpoint. I can guarantee you one other thing, ladies and gentlemen, this is not the first time they have behaved in this manner. On the contrary, they have quite a record of mocking and maligning. This is a history of selfishness, self-absorption, immaturity, and greed. And you will see how everyone who has come into contact with these four individuals has been abused, wronged, deceived and betrayed. This time, they have gone too far. This time they are going to be held accountable. This time, they are the ones who will pay.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54339,VANDELAY,Mr. Chiles.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54340,CHILES,"I am shocked and chagrined, mortified and stupefied. This trial is outrageous! It is a waste of the taxpayers' time and money. It is a travesty of justice that these four people have been incarcerated while the real perpetrator is walking around laughing - lying and laughing, laughing and lying. You know what these four people were? They were innocentbystanders. Now, you just think about that term. Innocent. Bystanders. Because that's exactly what they were. We know theywere bystanders, nobody's disputing that. So how can a bystander be guilty? No such thing. Have you ever heard of a guilty bystander? No, because you cannot be a bystander and be guilty. Bystanders are by definition, innocent. That is the nature of bystanding. But no, they want to change nature here. They want to create a whole new animal - the guilty bystander. Don't you let them do it. Only you can stop them.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54341,VANDELAY,Is the prosecution ready to present its first witness?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54342,HOYT,"We are, Your Honor. Call Officer Matt Vogel to the stand.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54343,BAILIFF,Call Matt Vogel.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54344,HOYT,So they were just standing there?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54345,VOGEL,Yes.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54346,HOYT,Did one of them have a video camera?,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54347,VOGEL,Yes.,23.0,S09E23,9.0 54348,HOYT,"Your Honor, with the court's permission, we would like to play back that video and enter it into evidence as Exhibit A.",23.0,S09E23,9.0 54349,VANDELAY,Proceed.,23.0,S09E23,9.0
